column2: "Na Moses frɛɛ Israel nyinara
column5: hom ntsie ahyɛdze nye atsɛmbu a mereka no hom asomu ndɛ da yi

column2: "EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn nye hɛn dzii ahyɛmu wɔ Horeb."
"Nnyɛ hɛn egyanom na EWURADZE nye hɔn dzii ahyɛmu yi
column4: hɛnara a ndɛ da yi hɛn nyinara tsetse ase ha yi a."

column2: "EWURADZE fii ogya no mu nye hom kasaa enyim nye enyim wɔ bepɔw no ho."
"Emi dze migyinaa EWURADZE nye hom ntamu aber no mu
column3: dɛ merekyerɛ hom EWURADZE asɛm; na osian gya no ntsi hom suroi
column4: na wɔammfow bepɔw no na ɔsee dɛ:"

column2: "Emi nye EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn a miyii wo fii Egypt asaase do
"Mma nnya enyame bi so nnka mo ho."
"Mma nnyɛ ohonyi bi
column4: anaa dza ɔwɔ asaase do famu
column5: anaa dza ɔwɔ nsu mu wɔ asaase ase no su biara ne saso mma woho:"

column2: "mma mmbɔ wo mu adze mma hɔn
column3: na nnsom hɔn: na emi EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn meyɛ Nyame nyinkufo a medze egyanom hɔn emumuyɛ mohwɛ mba kodu ebusuasantsen ebiasa nye anan a wɔtan me do;"

column2: "na muhu mpempem a wɔdɔ me na wodzi me mbransɛm do no mbɔbɔr."
"Mma mmbɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dzin gyangyan na EWURADZE nnkɛma nyia ɔbɔ ne dzin gyangyan no afa noho tɔtrɔtɔ."
"Dwen ahomgyeda no do sie no krɔnkrɔn
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ wo no."

column2: "Nda esia na yɛ edwuma na dzi wo dwuma nyinara:"
"na da a otsia esuon no yɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ahomgyeda: mma nnyɛ edwuma biara wɔ mu
column11: wo hɔhoe a ɔwɔ wo kuropon mu o; ama w'akowaa nye w'afonabaa aahom dɛ ɔwo."

column2: "Na kaa dɛ ɔwo yɛɛ akowaa wɔ Egypt asaase do
column3: na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze nsa a ɔyɛ dzen nye abasa a wɔatsɛw mu yii wo fii hɔ: dɛm ntsi na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ wo dɛ sie ahomgyeda no."

column2: "Dzi w'egya nye wo na nyi
column3: dɛ mbrɛ wo Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ wo no: na wo nda aawar
column5: wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do."

column2: "Mma nndzi ewu."
"Nkyii so nnto awar."
"Nkyii so nnwia adze."
"Nkyii so nngye wo nyɛnko ho dasewia."
"Nkyii so mma w'enyi mmber wo nyɛnko yer; nkyii so mma wo kɔn nndɔ wo nyɛnko fi
column8: anaa adze biara a ɔyɛ wo nyɛnko dze."

column2: "Nsɛm yi na EWURADZE fi ogya
column3: mununkum nye sum kebii no mu
column4: dze ndze kɛse kaa kyerɛɛ hom baguaa no nyinara wɔ bepɔw no do: na wɔammfa bi annka ho. Na ɔkyerɛɛw no wɔ abopon ebien do

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a hom tsee ndze no wɔ sum no mu
column4: wɔ aber a bepɔw no dzɛɛw gya no
column6: mekyerɛ hom ebusuakuw mu etsitsir nyinara

column2: "na hom see dɛ
column4: EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn eyi n'enyimnyam nye ne kɛseyɛ akyerɛ hɛn
column5: na yɛatse ne ndze wɔ gya no mu: ndɛ da yi na yeehu dɛ Nyankopɔn nye nyimpa kasa

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei ebɛnadze ntsi na yenwu? Osiandɛ gya kɛse yi rebɛhyew hɛn: sɛ yɛtse EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn ndze bio a
"Na honam nyinara mu woana na ɔatse Nyankopɔn tseasefo ndze dɛ ofi ogya mu rekasa
"Woara twe pin
column3: na tsie dza EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn bɛse nyinara: na woara bɛka dza EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn bɛka akyerɛ wo nyinara kyerɛ hɛn; na yebetsie

column2: "Na EWURADZE tsee hom nsɛm no ndze
column3: aber a hom kasaa kyerɛɛ me no; na EWURADZE see me dɛ
column4: Matse ɔman yi nsɛm no a wɔaka akyerɛ wo no ndze: dza wɔaka no nyinara

column2: "Ao kɛtseankyɛ woeenya dɛm akoma wɔ hɔn mu
column4: na woedzi me mbransɛm nyinara do daa daa
column5: na eesi hɔn na ɔnye hɔn mba yie daa!"

column2: "Kɔ kɛse hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nsan nkɔ hom asesee mu."

column2: "Na ɔwo dze
column6: nye atsɛmbu a edze bɛkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn no nyinara menkyerɛ wo
column7: na wɔnyɛ no wɔ asaase a medze rema hɔn dɛ wɔmfa no do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom ndwen do nyɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ahyɛ hom no: mma hom nndan mmfa enyimfa anaa abankum."
"Hom nnantsew kwan no a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ahyɛ hom no nyinara mu
column5: na hom nda aawar wɔ asaase a hom rekɛfa no do."
